items.title: Disabled state
items.description: Make buttons look inactive by adding the disabled boolean attribute to any button tag element. Disabled buttons have pointer-events: none applied to, preventing hover and active states from triggering.
items.code:
<button type="button" class="btn btn-primary" disabled>Primary button</button>
<button type="button" class="btn btn-secondary" disabled>Button</button>
<button type="button" class="btn btn-outline-primary" disabled>Primary button</button>
<button type="button" class="btn btn-outline-secondary" disabled>Button</button>
